title: Megan Fox
summary: Megan Denise Fox[1] (born May 16, 1986) is an American actress and model. She has made multiple appearances in major film franchises, most notably the Transformers franchise, as well as numerous magazines such as Maxim, Rolling Stone, and FHM.[2][3] She is the recipient of several accolades, including two Scream Awards and four Teen Choice Awards.
